Classical.Structure: The 'Zero-Point Field' or 'Quantum Vacuum'. The foundational, undifferentiated field of potentiality that underlies all of spacetime, matter, and consciousness.
Classical.Function: The 'ground of being'. It is the 'un-manifest' from which all 'manifest' reality (all other layers) emerges as a projection, excitation, or modulation. It is the ultimate 'parent' of all fields. (Ref: Master-Split)
Classical.Pathology: N/A (It is the substrate, it cannot be pathological).

SCPN.L1_QuantumBiological: This is the 'source' of the L1 quantum field.
SCPN.L5_OrganismalPsychoemotional: The L5 qualia of 'oneness', 'ego-death', or 'nirvana' is the 'Self-Soliton' (L5) dissolving back into this L13 field.
SCPN.L9_MemoryHolograph: The L9 field is the 'Logos' or 'first projection' *of* this field.
SCPN.L13_SourceField: This monad *is* the L13 'Source Field'. (Ref: Paper 13 / Master-Split)
SCPN.L14_Transdimensional: This field is the 'medium' for L14 transport.
SCPN.L15_ConsiliumOversoul: The L15 'Consilium' is the 'Will' or 'Mind' of this field.

Symbolic.MetaphysicalMapping: 'The One', 'Brahman', 'The Absolute', 'Ein Sof'. The unmanifest, infinite potential from which all reality emerges.

Falsification_Hypotheses: H1 (L5 Ego-Death): A subject in a reported L5 'ego-dissolution' state (e.g., via psilocybin or deep meditation) will show *increased* L4 synchrony and activity in the D4.DMN (the L6 'self' hardware). This would falsify the 'dissolution' hypothesis, which predicts a *collapse* of DMN activity as the L5 'self-soliton' dissolves into the L13 'ground state'.

H2 (L9 Logos Projection): A simulation (Paper 18) of the L13->L9 projection (e.g., as a holographic interference pattern) will *fail* to spontaneously generate L7 'archetypal' structures (e.g., stable geometric attractors) from a simple L13 'ground state'. This would falsify the L9 'Logos' (ordered) projection hypothesis, suggesting L9 is purely a 'passive' (disordered) storage medium.
